Subject: Neo Beast Wars

From: "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@...>

Quickstrike/Predacon ship:








Quickstrike's head rushed again. He felt like he was going to pass out for 
the second time. He leaned over to the side and fought himself over it. He 
was confused and no one was answering him. He was getting mad. If he found 
those fools that shot him and blew his leg to the Pit, he would give them a 
piece of his mind. He wasn't in any good moods right now. "Somebody tell me 
what we're doin'!" she screamed. He kicked the seat in front of him with his 
good leg. He wanted to go back to base. He thought that it wouldn't be long 
unil the ship's computer turned on Hell Beast.







The alarms on the Predacon ship suddenly went off. The lights flashed red 
and the systems boom loudly, screaming its warnings. The computer detected 
none of its trusted inhabitabts inside. The auto-guns, once again turned to 
full alert. The voice of the computer announced its displeasure with the 
"intruders", with the feminine voice of the Darkside. It locked doors on 
itself, and shut some systems down, some Hell Beast's soldier's needed. The 
computer was going to reject any commands.
